Question: This person passed for 311 yards as the Colts avoided their first 0–2 start since This person's rookie season.
Hints: This person and Addai helped the Colts to a 13–7 half-time lead, and an early fourth quarter touchdown upped the lead to 20–10.
This person attended Isidore Newman School in New Orleans, Louisiana.
This person hosted Saturday Night Live with musical guest Carrie Underwood on March 24, 2007, his 31st birthday.
